transcript:

Customer: Slowly baat karo. Main It's okay. Haan. Right. Ab main dheere dheere baat karungi, theek hai?

Customer: Haan. Ma'am dekhiye main aapko ek cheez batati hu agar na aapko kisi bhi concern koi bhi issue se related koi concern hua kare, aap mera number apne paas save karke rakhiye. Hum whatsapp pe bhi connected hain aur directly aapke paas mera number hai. So aap mujhe directly call kara karo jo bhi koi concern hua kare. Hamara jo 969696 wala number hai customer care ka number hai woh. Toh agar waha pe agar aap call milate hain kisi bhi concern se related toh pehle call helpline number pe jaati hai, phir woh aap unhe apna issue batate hain then phir call mujhe forward hogi, phir mujhe issue batayenge. Aapke liye time taking hota hai, process lengthy ho jaata hai. Better aap direct mujhe hi call kar liya karo.
Executive: Hmm. Okay.
Customer: Ab bataiye ki aapka problem kya tha?
Executive: Problem nahi hai.
Customer: Koi problem nahi hai. Hmm problem nahi hai. Main directly call karta hu tumhara number ka.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul. Oh customer care number nahi call.
Customer: Haan haan customer care number pe call karne ki zarurat nahi padegi aapko. Aap mujhe hi contact kar sakte ho direct, theek hai?
Customer: Right. Okay. Hmm.
Executive: Haan. Toh abhi aapne ye call isliye kiya tha waise aap kya concern hai bata do aap mujhe.
Customer: Oh enquiries full kam hai. Oh thoda thoda quantity enquiry zyada hai. Ye 1000 piece, 200 piece mein bulk order chahiye. Haan woh customized chahiye. Theek hai. Woh kam hai enquiries kam hai customized ka kam hai. Dusra kam hai woh 1000 piece, 200 piece woh 2000 piece woh zyada hai. Order. Haan bulk order kam, pura kam.
Executive: Theek hai. Ma'am main ek kaam karti hu for the full call se related main main koshish karungi ki zyada se zyada aapko main Haan woh woh idhar you know app ka main check karta hu bulk order. Main click karke check karta hu woh woh idhar andhe Karnataka kam hai woh.
Customer: Dusra state.
Executive: Dusre state zyada. Mere transportation bahut kashta andhe kashta aaguthe tumba. Haan haan. Haan woh dispatch bahut problem hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Haan. Toh main na abhi jaise aapke product ko search kiya hai abhi maine filter lagaya hai toh plain paper cup ki requirement aa rahi hai 25 25000, 25000 pieces ki requirement hai. Toh ye enquiry kaisi rahegi kya aapka Karnataka ki lead hai ma'am?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ye kaam ki hai ya nahi?
Customer: Woh Bengalur Bengalur Bengalur ka order hai woh.
Executive: Aapne baat kari? Aur 25 25000 cups mein dekhta hu aap mein IndiaMART mein main dekhta hu.
Customer: Aap isko check karo. Woh na woh mein bada size chahiye bada size. 210, 250, 300 ml woh 90 ml, 80 ml nahi chahiye woh bada size enquiry chahiye. Nahi ma'am 100 ml ki requirement usme mention hai.
Customer: Haan haan. 100 ml mein hi chahiye unko. Ek minute.
Executive: Kidhar kidhar check karta hu tum?
Customer: Ma'am buylead pe aaiye aap main bata deti hu. Haan buylead. Aur isme phir upar recent ka option aa raha hoga recent pe click kijiye.
Customer: Hmm. Woh multi color paper cup 500 piece.
Executive: Nahi nahi main bata rahi hu pehle filter apply kijiye. Recent pe aap aa gaye ho uske baad location ko India kijiye.
Customer: Location all all location click maadi. Theek hai select all India select all India.
Executive: Hmm. Theek after that aap click karo order value pe. Order value 10000 above 10000 select karo.
Customer: Oh kidhar kidhar order value kidhar hai?
Executive: Ma'am aap system pe chala rahe ho na abhi? Mobile mobile check madta idini.
Customer: Mobile. Dekhiye jaha pe location wagera ka option aa raha hai na usse just neeche wali line mein aapko bulk 25000 plus likha dikh raha hoga. Haan bulk 25 haan hai. Uspe click kariye. Click kar haan click maarde. Woh ab ye hai Gujarat but transportation zyada hai mein. Paisa zyada hai transportation.
Customer: Ma'am ek second. Haan. Dekhiye aap na udhar chala rahe ho na lap usse mobile ko chala rahe ho. Yaha pe Gujarat wali enquiry accha ye aapko ye dikh rahi hogi paper tea cup wali Gujarat Radhanpur wali. Haan. Theek hai isse pehle aapko ye nahi dikh rahi hai Kumta Karnataka ki enquiry. Ye Karnataka enquiry. Dikh rahi hai woh wali 25000 pieces wali. Show ho rahi hai aapko ya nahi? Haan Kumta Karnataka. Yes. Woh areca leaf plate mein now madalla adu. Main nahi karega. Areca leaf plate mein only paper cup. Koi baat nahi ye toh ma'am additional requirement hai unki. Matlab paper cup bhi chahiye hai aur areca leaf plates bhi chahiye hai. Toh aap agar plates mein deal nahi karte ho toh chhod do but at least cup ke regarding toh baat kar lo unse. Haan haan haan. Haan is lead ko consume karo aur call karke inse baat karo cup ke liye, theek hai? 100 ml ki requirement 100 ml size mein chahiye hai. 25000 pieces aur 50000 tak deal value hai toh ho sakta hai aapki baat ban jaaye isse. Hmm hmm. Madam main tumhara call karta hu abhi time main ghar ko jaana. Accha. Theek hai plus haan. Main tumhara morning call karta hu. Madam madam main suniye theek hai aapke concern ke regarding main aapko kal morning mein call kar lungi aur ek na video meeting contact video meeting connect karke aur acche tarike se hum discuss kar lenge price product ke bare mein quality ke bare mein, theek hai? Aur ek cheez aur hai abhi na aapka jo concern khul gaya hai main isko close kar deti hu. Aapke paas mail aapke paas mail par jo apni mail id registered hai na power cup wali us par ek feedback aayega mere diye hue solution se related toh usko aap satisfied ya yes ka option aa raha hoga woh click kar dijiyega, theek hai? Okay okay. Thank you. Baaki baaki morning mein na directly contact kar lenge ma'am, theek hai? Yes yes ma'am yes. Theek theek hai. Thank you. Thank you hmm.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Okay ma'am.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs bulk customized print orders.

- Enquiries are less for customized orders.

- Transportation costs are high for other states.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to filter buyleads.

- Executive suggested contacting the Karnataka lead.

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss further.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customized orders, transportation, filter
